website_summaries.verdict: A solid pair of goggles that includes a hard carrying case and bag.
pros: These goggles fit well over most glasses and come at a great price
They provide a wide view and have decent UV protection
Comfortable in warm and moist conditions
cons: Some customers reported that the goggles have a bad smell

customer_reviews.title: Good goggles
customer_reviews.text: Best goggles I’ve purchased online! I usually am sorely disappointed when I try to order stuff like this this online. The goggles fit my face well though and don’t seem to have issues (which I’ve had in the past) that make them “foggles” when we hit the slopes this weekend. The strap is comfortable and so is the padding around the face. Added bonus is the colors match my board and outfit! I’d recommend these for anyone that is looking for a decent pair without spending $300 on them. They also come in a super nice zip up case so I can store them easily in my board bag.
customer_reviews.author: Keely AllyseTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and look really cool!
customer_reviews.text: I got these because my son wanted some to dress up with so I can't comment on their effectiveness in the snow - but I CAN tell you that they are well made, look super cool and block out all UV rays! I even wore them to the beach one day because my eyes were sensitive that day and I needed the extra protection from the sun. They did an amazing job at keeping out all sun and glare. They also have vents at the top so they don't fog up. We've been planning on going snowboarding soon so I will get to put them to the test eventually. But as far as wearability and quality - they're pretty good!
customer_reviews.author: Alexia C Albert

customer_reviews.title: I’m ready for the slopes!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t want to overspend for goggles as I’m just a beginner and want to see how I like it first this season. These goggles looked like a good value and came in mid-range blue color that was recommended for various conditions. Fits comfortably and seems well made. Comes with a fog resistant inner coating which I tested by breathing on it in the cold and it worked! Nice hard case with soft bag is also included.
customer_reviews.author: eli

customer_reviews.title: Great ski goggles
customer_reviews.text: They are functional and stylish. They fit well with a helmet, eliminate quite a bit of glare and didnt fog up until I stupidly went to the top of the mountain and cried until someone came to get me. Even with the tears still only modestly foggy and o was still able to see. Lesson learned:keep the goggles stick to the bunny slopes :) I would recommend these goggles.
customer_reviews.author: Susie Derkins

customer_reviews.title: Really good quality with no fogging issues
customer_reviews.text: We have three pairs of these goggles now and everyone is happy with them. The extra vision that is offered over our old smith goggles is nice. Used them for a week in Utah in single digit temperatures to low 30’s and no issues with fogging up. For the price I think you will have a hard time finding a better pair of goggles. We ordered the 18% sun blocking after some research. This blocks the sun but provides enough contrast to steer in flat light conditions. Would buy again and did.
customer_reviews.author: MikeTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: what you want for your eyes while on the mountain
customer_reviews.text: I used these for 3 straight days in telluride, co. they worked great with the helmet I purchased (on Amazon). great visibility, added bonus of a durable carrying case and pouch. And I say this as someone who wears and loves Maui Jim sunglasses, Electric, etc. type brands. At this price, you won't be disappointed. They just need a snappier name, like March goggles or something.
customer_reviews.author: tizzy

customer_reviews.title: Good looking goggle with a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I have been skiing every year for about 10 years, and I bought this pair because my old one was broken. I compared with my old goggles, and this new pair of goggles has frameless design and bigger lens, so it is better looking and wider view. The goggles fit well with my helmet, and lens color is very cool. I am satisfied with the purchase; totally worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jing

customer_reviews.title: Durable, great fit (even if using with glasses), stay clear for a long period of time.
customer_reviews.text: Good looking ski goggles at a great price, specially for people like myself that only go skiing 3-4 times in the year. I bought Goggles for $10 but they looked cheap so I decided to spend a bit more and it was worth it. The have interchangeable lenses and they look like Oakley's. I found them while watching youtube videos and they were placed in 3rd place. I would highly recommend if your looking for something affordable but durable. Also they're very unisex my boyfriend and I share them all the time (not bulky).
customer_reviews.author: Clarita Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great for the intended use
customer_reviews.text: I don't ski, but I do ride a bicycle, so I needed some winter wind protection too. These goggles are fine when I wear my contacts, but don't quite work for me over my glasses. Great for daytime use; they cut the glare wonderfully. I tried them at night once, and while they did keep the glare of oncoming headlights out of my eyes, they also made it a little hard to see road hazards. I don't count that against them, because that's not what they're made for - just including it in case anyone else is considering it.
customer_reviews.author: Peregrin

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles for the price
customer_reviews.text: These goggles arrive in a sturdy carrying case which is impressive, but what is important is what is inside right? I have a 12 year old that no longer fits her kid goggles and needs a new pair. I feel confident buying these because they didn’t break my bank for something a kid might loose, however they are sturdy and safe for her. She tried them on and loved the bigger feel, yet snug enough to stay. The only thing I might be curious about going forward is how long the foam around the frame will last? Hopefully more than one or two seasons.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Performed well on the mountain and I looked hella cool
customer_reviews.text: No complaints here. Needed a pair of goggles for skiing. These looks the best. Really nice on the mountain for a novice skier like me. If you’re a pro snow man and love goggles you could probably tell the difference between this and an really expensive pair. But for the price and quality. This thing is v nice. Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Chiu

customer_reviews.title: Great ski goggles
customer_reviews.text: These are great for skiing or snowboarding. They look great and feel extremely comfortable. I used all season and they seem like they’ll last for years to come. They don’t fog and they protected my eyes from the sun. These are way better than the pair I was using before and these are half the cost. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Get THESE!!!! I SWEAR
customer_reviews.text: I never ever EVER LEAVE reviews.... they did not fog once... NOT ONCE.. the ONLY time they did have a sign of fog was on the lift and i blew down into my coat, then the heat from down below made a slight fog.... I swear on my damn life I had the best 2 days of "fogless" skiiing...... I paid $30, for 2 days of no fog googles....BUY THESE ....I PROMISE
customer_reviews.author: Alexander P. Kowalczyk

customer_reviews.title: These make me look like a million bucks!
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty great, especially for the price. My snowboarding day was fun, and these goggles helped a lot! Really cuts the glare, and as long as I keep them on, they stay fog-free. (Taking them off, wearing like sunglasses on my head, they accumulated lots of condensation and had to be cleaned/dried again, but then all was well!)
customer_reviews.author: TedStrykr

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and sleek looking goggles
customer_reviews.text: I bought these Hongdak Ski Goggles last year and they are still pristine and clean today. Performance is just as good as the expensive brands. Also, the mirrored lenses look really good. Furthermore, I have a large head (wear size 7 3/4 hat size) and these goggles do not feel uncomfortable at all. I will buy more for friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: B. Bautista

customer_reviews.title: Well made goggles
customer_reviews.text: These goggles worked really well for me and looked stylish as well. I am intermediate skier and found these goggles helped prevent the wind from blowing into my eyes, protected my eyes from the sun, and felt comfortable on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these last year decided to test them out. They work great so I just bought another pair this year for my girl friend.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, durable, blocks wind and sun.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my nephew who lives in Michigan and rides a motorcycle. He had this goofy pair of goggles he wore that I hated. These are way more stylish, block the wind, and sun, and make a good seal according to my nephew. So far he has only worn them a couple of times when the weather has been decent but He said he really likes them.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Too dark for cloudy days
customer_reviews.text: Look super nice, great case but on super Rainey dark days I can barely see. Only one lens comes with google although the description says the goggle can have up to two. The lens that comes with goggles for sunny days— too dark for super cloudy white out conditions and they do not seem to allow returns either. You get what u pay for,
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Weaver

customer_reviews.title: You need these!
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered these for my husband since he is an avid snowboarder but after receiving them, I kept them for myself!!! They are competitive with our name brand goggles! You can’t even tell a difference in quality & for the price, these can’t be beat! The anti fog lens work perfectly and they’re perfectly tinted to keep the sun out of my eyes when it reflects up from the snow! Definitely buying a second pair for my husband!
customer_reviews.author: Sapphire Wasson

customer_reviews.title: Superior Goggles
customer_reviews.text: I really like these goggles. They look great and I love the unobstructed view. They are rather large but they are flexible so they do store easy. The best part is the lens are interchangeable. These goggles are a great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Angela H

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing!!!! Wonderful for snow skiing or snow boarding! My son used these for skiing and then loaned them to my sister for her ski trip and she is now ordering some of her own! We all love these goggles!!! GREAT find! Definitely recommend! They also come with a protective cover and case!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne B.

customer_reviews.title: Great value and great-looking snowboarding goggles!
customer_reviews.text: Great value and great-looking snowboarding goggles! I got these for my son but I think I might wear them instead -- these goggles look really nice with the iridescent lenses and have good quality construction to them. They feel really comfortable too, can't wait to get out on the snow to test them out.
customer_reviews.author: Careful Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Best ski goggles for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I love these goggles. They are frameless, fit great, the color is awesome, they dont fog, and are comfortable. For the price, you just cant beat them! Have used them skiing many times, and theyve held up great.
customer_reviews.author: Don D

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles for the price. Confortable, cute and didn’t get foggy.
customer_reviews.text: I went skiing for 3 days, I wore them every day they never got foggy plus they were super comfortable and they look super cute!!! Great googles for the price
customer_reviews.author: KAT

customer_reviews.title: Breathable and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: When I got them there was an interesting smell that came with it. Even after airing them out it lingers a little bit. The design is great though. They are comfortable and breathable! No fogging up on the slopes is a good thing! I love the hard case that it came with to keep the goggles safe.
customer_reviews.author: Frizbos

customer_reviews.title: Ready to Shred? Add these to your gear pack!
customer_reviews.text: Such a cool pair of goggles. I wore these all last season, and they've held up really well. They look as if they would scratch easy, however, I've crushed tons of deep power, ice faces, and backcountry and there is barely a mark on them. The colors are bright and they are really comfortable. You can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey Bananas

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Ski Goggles
customer_reviews.text: These goggles are awesome!! They don’t fog and are super stylish. I ended up also getting a pair of oakleys but prefer these over the $200 oakleys! These fit my face better and I feel I get more visibility with these.
customer_reviews.author: Damien

customer_reviews.title: Works Great, above -20 F
customer_reviews.text: These goggles look very awesome, fits great, anti-fog works great. Until the fog freezes faster than goggles can vent it out, which is unavoidable problem. It cannot be blamed on the goggles themselves. On plus side, they resist winds extremely well. Kept my face warm even in -30 F polar vortex weather, despite lens frosting over. Afterwards, the anti-fog function still works well and it's good for windy winter days.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: ... from trying them on a few times they seem sturdy and feel very comfortable on
customer_reviews.text: These have not been used on the slopes yet but from trying them on a few times they seem sturdy and feel very comfortable on. The strap is heavy duty and it was adjustable to the right spot and it does not slide. I will write another review once they have been used on the slopes.
customer_reviews.author: blueblackmolly

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and no fogging!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome!! They are beautiful, come in a sturdy black case, have a soft bag case as well, and are super comfortable! The strap around your head is incredibly comfy too. Even my 3 1/2 yr old loved to wear them. He's very picky! I kept them on a while, it was freezing outside, and they didn't fog!
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Goggles!
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased goggle last year from my son. They looked so cool and worked so good, when I planned my trip to Mammoth this year, I bought goggles for myself and my girlfriend. We both loved them. They look so stylish and performed amazingly. Perfectly happy with the purchase and would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Heughens

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these goggles!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these goggles. These goggles have large field of view, they have not fogged up once and have not scratched at all! I would buy them again in a second, great value!
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Very cool and sturdy goggles
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 Hongdak goggles for my kids and myself. Kids just love these beautiful goggles, they want to go out ski more with those cool goggles one. It is crystal clear through the lens and just makes your eye feel comfortable in harsh winter snow and wind. Now their friends are asking where to buy the same, without a doubt I recommended Hongdak
customer_reviews.author: John H.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Goggles!!
customer_reviews.text: These goggles are really amazing. I've had more expensive Dragon Alliance goggles and these we better for me. They have a very similar style, but these didn't fog up at all. I would recommend these to anyone looking for some quality goggles. I have the black lenses and I'll be buying another pair or lighter lenses. The dark ones work very well in sunny conditions, but if it's cloudy it's a little difficult to see. These goggles are the best and they're cheap!!
customer_reviews.author: KathyJutte

customer_reviews.title: Great price for great goggles
customer_reviews.text: I love these ski goggles. They work well, are super comfortable and they look great. I was nervous to purpose a pair that is so less expensive than more commonly known brands, but I'm glad I did. These are totally worth it. The case they come in is super convenient, though my only complaint is they're a little stinky (sort of a new-plastic smell) that's exaggerated by being shut up in the case. That said, they're otherwise perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Anné Jude Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: They’re cute, fit well and we’re very helpful to see as the snow was falling on the mountain. If you’re not much of a snowboarder or skier they’re a great bargain and do the job at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Short

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money!!! They look like you paid 5X as much!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these goggles for last years ski season... they were well worth the money. They looked awesome, worked awesome. And shippped exactaly when they were supposed to. If I had to make one criticism it would be that they smelled a little strong when they were removed from the package, so be sure to air them out first....
customer_reviews.author: Julie Rush

customer_reviews.title: It looked nice on and even complimented by the resort staff
customer_reviews.text: I wore it once for a ski trip. It looked nice on and even complimented by the resort staff. In general it works fine, but it could get foggy when I started to sweat in the first few rounds. I later removed one layer under my jacket. It didn't fog up further after my body cooled down and stayed in comfortable temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Yuan

customer_reviews.title: These goggles are great!! We bought them to wear while driving ...
customer_reviews.text: These goggles are great!! We bought them to wear while driving the four wheeler in the snow and they have not let us down!!! They keep the snow our and help keep your face warm! Love that they come with a case to protect them!!
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the money
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight nice lens color but they do get moist inside especially in snowy and windy conditions. Decent goggles for the money. Include a hard storage case. Will update after a few more uses to see how they hold up
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles and price, but agree about terrible smell!
customer_reviews.text: These goggles are super cheap and great quality, but the smell is so overpowering. I left them in the basement for over a week before using them, and can still smell the strong chemicals when wearing them. Disclosure: Hongdak offered me a cash reward to leave an honest review here.
customer_reviews.author: Luthier

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Didn't fog up too often, pretty good for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Jhonson

customer_reviews.title: These googles are very nice! I was impressed with the quality of the ...
customer_reviews.text: These googles are very nice! I was impressed with the quality of the googles. I wore them and I was very impressed that they did not fog up. They were clear and did not distort my vision. The adjustable strap is fits nicely and is comfortable. I would definitely recommend these googles.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Lemons

customer_reviews.title: These were perfect for 4 wheeling in the snow
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for 4 wheeling in the snow. They are big enough to keep the snow out of my eyes with the snow rapidly hitting my face. They also come on a great case that includes a carrying bag, if needed.
customer_reviews.author: starburst_1

customer_reviews.title: Fits large men's glasses great
customer_reviews.text: I have larger glasses than average and they fit comfortably under these goggles. They do pull my glasses off when I remove goggles but they are comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: G. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bang for buck
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and nice quality for the price. Removable lenses is also very convenient if they ever break or you dont like the color you ended up buying. Came with a case thats fairly durable along with a sleeve to go over the goggles themselves. Would definitely recommend these to someone who is just starting out for snowboarding or skiing.
customer_reviews.author: NEI

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles!
customer_reviews.text: These in no way inhibit your vision... and they make your surroundings even more vivid!
customer_reviews.author: Farsiwan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: They work wonderfully so far! I love the color too.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: These are really comfortable. They are great for both glare and anti-fog
customer_reviews.text: These are really comfortable. They are great for both glare and anti-fog. I love that they come in a sturdy case to protect them while stored or on the way to the slopes.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Nadeau

customer_reviews.title: Great goggle for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I've really enjoyed the clarity and sunblocking of my goggles. They are lightweight and generally durable, the only exception being how easy it is to get scratched. Any scratch shows up as a bright spot in your vision. Still, for the price, this goggle is hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: Drone Newbie

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: These goggles were a great value. They look and function just like the expensive goggles but for way less money. They fit great and looked even better. My only complaint and the reason I did not give it a full 5 stars is the goggles smell a little funny when you receive them. It smells like weird plastic. I used some frebreeze on them and let them sit outside for a while and eventually most of the smell went away.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Hummel

customer_reviews.title: Great for skiing!
customer_reviews.text: I am not very experienced in skiing, but these goggles worked great! I had a cheap pair the first time I went out and they broke when I accidentally hit my face with my pole. I bought this pair after that and I love them! Great color too! Very easy to see through, no gapping, and no fogging.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Did the job well at a qtr the price
customer_reviews.text: Needed goggles for a snowboarding trip in to CO this past year. Settled on these due to the reviews but was still skeptical due to being disappointed with more expensive goggles in the past. NOT skeptical anymore more! Not only do they work great (NO fogging) but they look pro too. I still remember when inexpensive goggles were cheap as they come, not here at all. Would by again
customer_reviews.author: Amy Dal Bello

customer_reviews.title: Worked great over my daughter glasses
customer_reviews.text: These ski goggles worked great over my daughter's glasses, she can't wait to wear them again this winter. They are very comfortable to wear and have a stylish design that my daughter loved. Both lenses did a great job. Googles didn't fog and are worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Cisneros

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome goggles. Fit very comfortably and don’t fog up. Love the color.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Jo Gillam

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and they work really well
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and they work really well. I like that they come with a soft case and a hard case to protect them.
customer_reviews.author: Angi Phipps

customer_reviews.title: Fits nicely over glasses
customer_reviews.text: I loved the color. I was in need of goggles that fit over my glasses and these worked really well. I used them inn a day that was both sunny and foggy , the clarity was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Randie

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I’m pretty impressed with the quality for this price. It works well and fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Angelica

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish product and works really well
customer_reviews.text: First, the look of it is absolutely stunning and I get excited looking at it just by looking at it before going skiing. The quality of this product is also very good, and I have owned it through 2 seasons of ski season now and still very sturdy. Would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Good for money. Make sure not to fog them up is all.
customer_reviews.author: j. hickey

customer_reviews.title: Great goggle at a fair price
customer_reviews.text: I received the goggles quickly and put them to work right away. The goggles weren't purchased for skiing but rather for snow blowing and snowmobiling. Of real importance was the antifog feature because its important to be able to see what i'm doing. I'm looking forward to years of service from these great looking goggles.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Looks awesome and wears comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This goggle is soft touch with skin, and I have no problem with my goggle even with my eye glasses on. Feels warm and comfortable. Strongly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Kelvin L.

customer_reviews.title: Really nice field of vision.
customer_reviews.text: Unlike many other ski goggles around the same price point, I experienced a great field of vision as the borders weren't in the way. Also, I really liked the comfort these goggles provided when wearing for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Yuriy Kakulidis

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable pair of ski goggles!
customer_reviews.text: These are an excellent pair of ski goggles. They are comfortable while protecting the eyes from the sun and wind!
customer_reviews.author: Rashmi S

customer_reviews.title: Good ski google
customer_reviews.text: Good ski google for daytime skiing. Used mine in sun as well as overcast conditions and didn’t have a problem with the googles fogging up or blocking my vision. Good fit. Not to dark of a lens. I was able to see imperfections in the terrain without lowering visibility.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Russell

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: These worked out great. Super comfortable. And the fit worked out well even for the smallish head size that we used this on.
customer_reviews.author: a

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: With this reasonable price I am surprised by the quality,nothing to complain.I don’t see a reason why you would spend 100$ on the other “professional”goggles instead of getting one like this from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Xukai Tang

customer_reviews.title: Easily adjusted
customer_reviews.text: Was pleased with these ski goggles. They came protected in a nice zipper case. They can be easily adjusted to fit my husband or myself. Perfect for sports in the snow!
customer_reviews.author: Marsha

customer_reviews.title: Most excellent ski goggles.
customer_reviews.text: Used these goggles for our first west coast ski trip. They work excellently and look really cool! Buying another.
customer_reviews.author: Hellen Sun

customer_reviews.title: Very Cool
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome, i didn’t expect it to come in a nice box with a cover for the goggles and they look amazing. Cant wait to try them next weekend
customer_reviews.author: Cyn

customer_reviews.title: Nephew likes the googles and they seem to be of good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for nephew who recently started snowboarding. Nephew likes the googles and they seem to be of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: YoSeriouslyxox

customer_reviews.title: Need them! Worth every 💵
customer_reviews.text: Wore these on a crazy windy day in the slopes! Holy moly they saved me! Never fog up, super comfy, not too dark, and heckin cute!
customer_reviews.author: La corte

customer_reviews.title: They were wonderful, gave good eye protection
customer_reviews.text: They were given as a gift fir a young adult’s first ski trip. They were wonderful, gave good eye protection
customer_reviews.author: N. Prewitt

customer_reviews.title: Best Onion Goggles EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these goggles! However, I must confess, I don't use them in the traditional way...I use them for those times when I have to cater a large-ish event and need to chop buckets full of onions...keeps the tears at bay so I can finish my job!
customer_reviews.author: Veronika Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This product was exactly what I was expecting. Perfect for the snowy mountain.
customer_reviews.author: seng2k

customer_reviews.title: My nephew absolutely loved these!
customer_reviews.text: Strong smell when these were opened. Let it air out for a few days & cant notice the smell anymore. My nephew absolutely loved these!!
customer_reviews.author: Krista Salsman

customer_reviews.title: These goggles are great for the price
customer_reviews.text: These goggles are great for the price! They are easily adjustable, and they block out the sun really well. I'm an avid snowboarder but don't like to pay the price of high end goggles, and I am so glad I found these! They don't fog up either like others around this price. Great quality would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: An awesome selection!
customer_reviews.text: Supper cool goggles! The mirrored lense is neat. Also being able to replace the lense for a different shade is nice. Perfect for the sport you love!
customer_reviews.author: duane

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: Looks awesome, great for cold and wind. Buy fog spray the coating wears off in a day, but for the money it's a great buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value Ski Goggle
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and offers great value. I love they way they look. The only bad thing with mine is that it has a slight smell even after airing it out for a week.
customer_reviews.author: Felix Cao

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Great for skiing in Aspen!! Did not fog up for me.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles for the price
customer_reviews.text: My friend has some very expensive similar goggles and we swapped and compared for a day on the slopes and neither of us could tell the difference. These are amazing goggles for the price, I would 100% recommend and buy again, in fact I did buy a second pair for my wife.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon W

customer_reviews.title: Great style and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Great goggles for the price, and loved the style as well. A small amount coating did come off after a fall, but overall they held up well though the season and had good ventilation.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Having previously bought more expensive brands, I was skeptical about the quality due to the price. But these performed just as well on the slopes as my older more expensive pairs, and looked great too. 10/10 would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Great Ski Goggles
customer_reviews.text: Goggles were awesome for springtime skiing. Took them to Breckenridge and used them on sunny and cloudy/snowy days and had no issues. Great visibility and very comfortable. Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Niethamer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these googles for the skiing trip and what a great product that is. Cost is much less than the leading brands but the performance is the same. I had no issues with fogging or anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Dima

customer_reviews.title: Incredibles
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this product 100%. I bought it for my trip to colorado and absolutely LOVE it. Beautiful color, perfect fit, comes with an adjustable band very easy to use, and makes you look really cool. Don’t hesitate to buy it. Posted a pic of me wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Maria daniela Mendez figallo

customer_reviews.title: good fit, came in a nice case
customer_reviews.text: good fit, came in a nice case. these were a much better quality than the ones I had found for the price
customer_reviews.author: D Nolen

customer_reviews.title: Love these! They are perfect for fitting over the ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They are perfect for fitting over the helmet. Wide range of vision and can also be used for dirt bike. The foam is well made is is not itchy.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon M. Lane

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles for snow, rain, or mud
customer_reviews.text: Pay what you want for a pair of quality goggles, but if you spend more than this pair costs, you paid too much. Thoroughly impressed with all aspects of these goggles. They fit well, filter the sun well, and look fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Kiley and Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great Goggles
customer_reviews.text: These goggles were great. I had glasses at the time I first used them so that was a little bit difficult, but I have contacts now and they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Allen

customer_reviews.title: No Fog, works great
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product about 15 times during snowboarding. My rayban glass doesn't fit inside, so either I have to use this or only the rayban. I have tried my prescription glass which fits inside. I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Pritesh

customer_reviews.title: Worth it !
customer_reviews.text: Loved these! Unfortunately I lost them on the mountain but I definitely will be purchasing again! Comfortable, and great color!
customer_reviews.author: alexis

customer_reviews.title: Great cost/benefit
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these goggles for me and my wife to go snowboarding/skiing. Works pretty well and it's a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The price is great and they preforme great
customer_reviews.text: I like them lens is great I’ll never pay stupid money for goggles again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price, Great googles!
customer_reviews.text: Great ski goggles! They didn’t fog and felt very comfortable. I even received compliments from the ski lift operators!
customer_reviews.author: UTMelody

customer_reviews.title: Good Budget Goggles!
customer_reviews.text: These goggles are comfortable and fit my face well. Very affordable for good quality ski goggles. No snow got inside my goggles during my 8 hour session.
customer_reviews.author: sk227

customer_reviews.title: Most Affordable and Best Ski/Snowboard Goggles!
customer_reviews.text: great goggles for a very cheap price! worked really well on the slopes and will definitely recommend to friends as the best and most affordable ski/snowboard goggles.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Power

customer_reviews.title: Great Goggles
customer_reviews.text: These are great goggles and very resilient. No scratches when I crashed while snowboarding. The goggles are comfortable for all day play and don't hurt my nose like many have. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Fennell

¡¾Detachable Lens System¡¿ - The detachable lens system provides spare lenses with different colors, suitable for different weather conditions and personal preference when skiing, snowboarding or other winter sports.

¡¾Design & Helmet Compatible¡¿- The OTG Design lets you wear your glasses under the goggles. Adjustable strap and engineered frame shape for better helmet compatibility, designed for both adults and teens.
¡¾Spherical super-wide view and smooth venting¡¿ - The panoramic lens design provides more than 180 degree view and super clear vision
